plugin.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Client Plugin]
plugin.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Browser-based rich interface. Contains configurations for theming, custom welcome message, etc.]

global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[URI to a custom image to be used as start up logo]

global_param.name: CUSTOM_DASH_LOGO
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[User Home Logo]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Replace the logo displayed in the welcome page]

global_param.name: CLIENT_TIMEOUT_TIME
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Client Timeout]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[The length of the client session in SECONDS. By default, it's copying the server session length. In most PHP installation, it will be 1440, ie 24minutes. You can set this value to 0, this will make the client session 'infinite' by pinging the server at regular occasions (thus keeping the PHP session alive). This is not a recommanded setting for evident security reasons.]

global_param.name: CLIENT_TIMEOUT_WARN
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Warning Before]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Number of MINUTES before the session expiration for issuing an alert to the user]
